name: @oaklean/cli
author: Hitabis GmbH
description: A command-line interface that provides utilities for parsing, inspecting, and converting the .oak file format, as well as interfaces used in the @oaklean suite.

scripts.build: npx rimraf ./dist && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tsc
scripts.setup: npm run build && npm uninstall -g @oaklean/cli; npm link
